description: Why did the Chicken cross the road? Find out in Crossy Road, the 8-bit endless arcade hopper that became a global phenomenon. Now fully optimized for Windows 8, this hit from Hipster Whale takes the classic Frogger formula and transforms it into a colorful, addictive, and hilarious journey through a blocky world of traffic, trains, and rivers.
